control_attributes.control_description: The organization identifies potential accessibility problems to the alternate processing site in the event of an area-wide disruption or disaster and outlines explicit mitigation actions.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization tests alternate telecommunication services [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].

Control Statement: The organization identifies potential accessibility problems to the alternate processing site in the event of an area-wide disruption or disaster and outlines explicit mitigation actions.
